tests.title: Context endpoint returns context.md
tests.expected: GET /api/context returns status ok and markdown content with non-trivial length.

tests.title: Decisions persist and remain queryable
tests.expected: POST /api/memory/decisions adds a decision; GET /api/memory/decisions includes it.

tests.title: Context regenerates after intent update
tests.expected: After PUT /api/memory/live-record/intent, /api/context contains updated goal text.

tests.title: Mock live error links to active issues
Duplicate errors are deduplicated
tests.expected: Injecting same error multiple times results in single active issue with count >= 3.

tests.title: Live error log remains bounded under spam
tests.expected: After high-volume inject, /api/live-errors count does not exceed configured ring buffer size.

tests.title: Noisy query still matches recorded insight
tests.expected: After storing a unique lesson insight, /api/memory/search with noisy query returns relevant result.

tests.title: Handover stores meaningful summary
tests.expected: POST /api/memory/handover then GET returns non-empty summary including critical terms.

tests.title: Avoid list captures anti-patterns
tests.expected: POST /api/memory/avoid persists and is retrievable via GET.
